ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Quest Gems help needed
ygData.msgSnippet: Every race has different looking one.  The gnome one for female looks like sphere cut in half with goggles on the front, really crazy looking. Mu ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
Every race has different looking one. The gnome one for female looks like
sphere cut in half with goggles on the front, really crazy looking.

Mu

-----Original Message-----
From: Moss [mailto:Olmoss@...]
Sent: Wednesday, June 06, 2001 3:24 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Quest Gems help needed


Christopher M Andrews wrote:
> Icewell and Velk were the two that I've found to drop gems most
frequently.
> In CS there is no faction hit when killing drakes and wyverns

Whoop ! I didn't know that Pava :) When we going ! ..also, Velk's Lab,
I waltzed in there, conned a greenie and got 2. I was dead 1 minute
later from Poison dots !! A word to the wiser than I :)

To Jeff,
this morning I ran into a Woodelf lady in the COOLEST helm I have seen
yet !! I want ONE ! She told me it is our Woodie racial Helm.. hope the
graphic is the one you are talking about :) I had Wings on the side and
the Visor bulged out as real medieval visors did.... a burnished blue
steel color.. Way far away from the other "bucket" graphics....

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
